name: Running Fox
description:
Running Fox

Welcome to our exciting new Jump & Run game, where you embark on an adventure with a cute little fox! Your mission is to collect all 100 diamonds scattered throughout the level.

As you navigate through various challenging platforms and obstacles, you'll need to use your jumping skills and quick reflexes to avoid traps and falling down deep chasms. Precision and timing are key to success.

But be careful! You may need to keep your eyes open to even find the hardest hideouts.

Can you help the little fox collect all 100 gems and become the ultimate champion?

Get ready to jump, run, and explore in this adventure! Are you up for the challenge? Let's go!
